result.name: Multi-omics colocalization with genotype-wide association studies reveals a context-specific genetic mechanism at a childhood onset asthma risk locus
result.description: We generated imputed genotypes from 104 individuals from whole blood or airway epithelial cells. This data was generated in combination with genome-wide DNA methylation data (RNAseq) and genotypes from the same individuals as part of an expression and DNAm quantitatively loci study.
